sentences.english: Peeing was my trigger and drinking coffee was my habit.
sentences.chinese: 如厕就是一个触发器，而喝咖啡就是我的习惯了。

sentences.english: When a constipation suggestion retired old person goes to the bathroom, faints suddenly in the place.
sentences.chinese: 便秘诱发型一离休老人如厕时，突然晕倒在地。

sentences.english: Toilet humor aside, two-and-a-half billion people still do not have access to a hygienic toilet.
sentences.chinese: 严肃来说，仍然有25亿人民没有卫生的如厕环境。

sentences.english: My son is three years old; he is learning to use the potty and brush his teeth at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 我的儿子三岁了，眼下开始进行如厕和刷牙学习。

sentences.english: The locking elevated toilet seat with arms eliminates the need for toilet safety rails.
sentences.chinese: 这款扶手式同步升降马桶座椅提供了安全如厕的需要。

sentences.english: Where many miscalculate is starting toilet training before the child is able to cope.
sentences.chinese: 有很多人对宝宝开始可以应付如厕的时机估计错误。

sentences.english: How do astronauts go to the bathroom in space?
sentences.chinese: 宇航员们在太空中是怎样如厕的呢？

sentences.english: And so he died: intestinal infection after months without moving his bowels.
sentences.chinese: 后来他死了，几个月不如厕，死于肠道感染。

sentences.english: Now I rise, pee, and immediately go to my meditation chair.
sentences.chinese: 现在我起床，如厕，然后立马进入我的冥想专椅。

definition: to urinate or defecate/urine and feces
Turkish toilet/squat toilet/to vacate one's bowels
chamber pot/wooden pan used as toilet/toilet bowl
